items.title: 7.3 magnitude earthquake rattles Alaskan island, prompting tsunami warning
items.description: A 7.3 magnitude earthquake struck near Sand Point, Alaska, on Wednesday, prompting a tsunami warning from the National Weather Service.

items.title: Trump blasts 'stupid,' 'foolish' Republicans amid calls to reveal more Epstein files
items.description: President Donald Trump continued Wednesday to dismiss calls within his own party for more transparency into the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.

items.title: Fire at assisted-living facility 'was destined to kill 50-plus people': Chief
items.description: The fire that claimed nine lives at an assisted-living facility in Fall River, Massachusetts, "was destined to kill 50-plus people," according to the ...

items.title: WATCH:  Hikers confront man accused of starting fire on Los Angeles trail
items.description: A group of hikers stepped in to help stop an alleged arsonist accused of starting a fire in LA's popular Runyon Canyon.

items.title: WATCH:  New Jersey delivery driver almost struck by lightning
